definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
Rigel (star)/lit. seventh star of the Three Stars Chinese constellation

sentences.english: The only two missing star positions are for Betelgeuse and Rigel.
sentences.chinese: 只有兩個失蹤星級職務是參宿四和參宿七。

sentences.english: The only two missing star positions are for Betelgeuse and Rigel.
sentences.chinese: 只有兩個失蹤星級職務是參宿四和參宿七。

sentences.english: What is less certain is when it will explode.
sentences.chinese: 而不太明確的則是參宿四將在何時爆炸。

sentences.english: The brightest star in the frame, near the bottom right, is Rigel .
sentences.chinese: 影像中最亮的恆星位於右側底部，它是參宿七。

sentences.english: A red supergiant, Betelgeuse is no slouch of a star either.
sentences.chinese: 參宿四是一顆紅色的超巨星。

sentences.english: Notice the two nearby stars, Rigel Kentaurus and Hadar.
sentences.chinese: 注意兩顆鄰近的星星，參宿七和哈達爾。

sentences.english: Yellow-orange Betelgeuse is the brightest star on the image left.
sentences.chinese: 黃橙色的參宿四是照片中剩下的最亮的恆星。

sentences.english: The map will be redrawn centred on the position of Betelgeuse.
sentences.chinese: 地圖將以參宿四爲中心重繪。

definition: Vega, brightest star in constellation Lyra 天琴星座
the intersection of the Moon's orbit with the ecliptic in Vedic astronomy (Sanskrit rahu)
Star God of Rank and Affluence (Daoism)
twelve divisions of the day of early Chinese and Babylonian timekeeping and astronomy
Wuying district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
eta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
